name: Cecio of the valley
description:
This is my entry to #ToyBoxJam, a tiny top down adventure done in a 20 day time frame limit, with a little genre shift at the end.

controls
  • move player around with arrow keys
  • perform action with Z
  • speed up texts with X 
game

A legend is known among the village dwellers… A mysterious being lives up in the hills. One day Cecio woke up decided to see for himself whether the legend speaks the truth.

  • Take control of *Cecio* in his wonderful adventure
  • Grab the sword, head to the dungeon!
  • What *Cecio* will find at the end of his voyage?

Thank you for playing and have fun!
